Today in County Sligo, it's looking solid with 8 ft @12s WNW swell and light 10 mph WSW winds. Strandhill and Easkey spots are both working well, especially during their optimal tide windows. Tomorrow, conditions drop to 5 ft @10s with fresh 22 mph SE winds, making it poor across the board. Day after, we bounce back to 7 ft @15s with light 7 mph SSE winds, offering cleaner conditions at Strandhill and Easkey. Best: today.
